name: Rage Software Game Resource Package
summary: An XFS file is a game resource package used by various video games developed by Rage Software, including the eRacer and Rage Rally car racing games. It may contain sound effects (e.g., engine noises or collision sounds) or a music track (e.g., background music for a playable racetrack) played during gameplay. XFS files may also store models for objects in a game, such as rally cars in the Rage Rally game.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
